lead_paragraph: Facebook, Google, Twitter and Microsoft announced they have teamed up to fight the spread of such content online by sharing technology and information.

headline.print_headline: Facebook and Other Tech Companies Seek to Curb the Flow of Terrorist Content
headline.main: Facebook and Other Tech Companies Seek to Curb Flow of Terrorist Content

snippet: Facebook, Google, Twitter and Microsoft announced they have teamed up to fight the spread of such content online by sharing technology and information....
abstract: Facebook, Google, Twitter and Microsoft announce they will partner to prevent spread of terrorist content online; plan involves digitally tagging terrorist images and videos and then compiling tags into shared database that makes it easier to spot and remove such content across their respective platforms.
